job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to revolutionize the telecom industry with AI-powered innovation? We're seeking a forward-thinking Java Developer to help us reshape how service providers monetize their networks through our cutting-edge Charging-as-a-Service platform.

   Picture yourself architecting a cloud-native charging engine that handles massive transaction volumes while leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions. Our platform isn't just another charging system - it's the future of telecom monetization, powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities.

   We respect your time: our streamlined 4-hour application process can be completed at your pace, with quick turnaround times - assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions in 2 business days.

   If you're excited about being at the intersection of AI and enterprise software innovation, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Pioneer the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform, where scalability meets innovation
     * Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML to revolutionize plan management
     * Push the boundaries of what's possible by integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Wrestling with infrastructure headaches - we've streamlined these tasks to keep you focused on innovation
     * Getting stuck in meeting marathons - we prioritize your coding time over endless discussions, * Architect and enhance our telecom charging platform to deliver unprecedented speed-to-market and unlimited scalability
     * Design and implement AI-powered features that transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes
job_details.full_text:
Java Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Ready to revolutionize the telecom industry with AI-powered innovation? We're seeking a forward-thinking Java Developer to help us reshape how service providers monetize their networks through our cutting-edge Charging-as-a-Service platform.

   Picture yourself architecting a cloud-native charging engine that handles massive transaction volumes while leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions. Our platform isn't just another charging system - it's the future of telecom monetization, powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities.

   We respect your time: our streamlined 4-hour application process can be completed at your pace, with quick turnaround times - assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions in 2 business days.

   If you're excited about being at the intersection of AI and enterprise software innovation, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Pioneer the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform, where scalability meets innovation
     * Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML to revolutionize plan management
     * Push the boundaries of what's possible by integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Wrestling with infrastructure headaches - we've streamlined these tasks to keep you focused on innovation
     * Getting stuck in meeting marathons - we prioritize your coding time over endless discussions, * Architect and enhance our telecom charging platform to deliver unprecedented speed-to-market and unlimited scalability
     * Design and implement AI-powered features that transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Java development and enterprise software, with AI mentioned as a feature of the platform rather than the core focus of the role. It lacks the specific tasks and technologies associated with ML or GenAI engineering roles.

phrases: Java Developer
architecting a cloud-native charging engine
Pioneer the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform
Architect and enhance our telecom charging platform
Design and implement AI-powered features
job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions 'Java Developer' and focuses on architecting, developing, and enhancing a platform, which are core software development activities. The integration of AI features into this platform also falls under software development.

phrases: revolutionize the telecom industry
reshape how service providers monetize their networks
transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions
future of telecom monetization
transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes understanding the business context of the telecom industry, monetization strategies, and transforming complex billing scenarios, indicating a need for business understanding to guide technical solutions.

phrases: leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios
powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities
Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML
integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow
Design and implement AI-powered features
job_tasks.justification: While not detailing the creation of models from scratch, the role involves 'harnessing the power of NLP and ML' and 'integrating cutting-edge AI tools', suggesting some level of interaction with or application of AI models, though the depth is unclear.

phrases: forward-thinking
AI-powered innovation
revolutionize
Pioneer the development
Push the boundaries of what's possible
innovation
architecting a cloud-native charging engine that handles massive transaction volumes
transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions
revolutionize plan management
transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes
integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow
